title: Free weekend travel for seniors across Victoria from January 2026
articleDescription: From 1 January 2026, Victorian seniors will be able to travel for free on public transport anywhere in Victoria on weekends.
articleContent:
Seniors concession myki holders can currently travel for free within two consecutive zones at the weekend. The change means that those who travel regularly will save more than $360 a year.

Seniors must carry their Seniors Card and continue to tap on and off as usual, but their myki won’t be charged. The new entitlement will be automatically added to cards on 1 January 2026.

Find more information on how to get a Seniors concession myki here.
